description.storage: To use sync services like iCloud Drive, Google Drive of Dropbox, simply move storage to the corresponding synced folders

migrate.1: To migrate from massCode v1.0 select the folder containing the database files.
migrate.2: To migrate from SnippetsLab select JSON file.
3: Some Limitations. During migration from SnippetsLab:
All folders will be first level as JSON file (below v2.1) does not represent nested folders.
Snippets with unsupported languages will be set to default Plain Text.

description.htmlCssPreview: Add fragments with HTML & CSS languages to view result.
